reviewText: I score nearly 5 stars just for Zakk Wylde's guitars alone. Thank god his guitars were used! They, alone, would make the fictitious band, Steel Dragon, a real life success!

This was based loosely on the break-up and adding of a new singer of the real band Judas Priest.
This film is an insult to rock and roll history and film.

One of my all time guilty pleasures,the soundtrack is totally awesome,Mark Wahlberg is totally believable,Jennifer Aniston is in her prime,so lovely,and those are actual musicians playing the Steel Dragon band members. A fact that some don't know,is that the film initially,was based on the true life story of the band Judas Priest,when their lead singer left the band,they hired Tim owens,who was the singer in a Judas Priest tribute band.
